name: Silentnight Anti-Allergy Pillows 2 Pack – Soft Medium Support Anti Bacterial, Bed Hotel Pillows for Back, Stomach and Side Sleepers, White
review: My pillows get well used and consequentially don't last very long. These pillows were flattened and out of shape and bounce within a couple of months. They are soft at least which I prefer. I just wish I could find longer lasting pillows. Considering replacing them already. Cheap and soft but not very long lasting.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 January 2024

name: Silentnight Anti-Allergy Pillows 2 Pack – Soft Medium Support Anti Bacterial, Bed Hotel Pillows for Back, Stomach and Side Sleepers, White
review: Very comfortable and good value for money. I typically prefer firmer pillows but makes an excellent second pillow to boost the height.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 6 January 2024

name: Silentnight Anti-Allergy Pillows 2 Pack – Soft Medium Support Anti Bacterial, Bed Hotel Pillows for Back, Stomach and Side Sleepers, White
review: Great pillow. Very squishy and returns to shape nicely.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 7 January 2024

name: Silentnight Anti-Allergy Pillows 2 Pack – Soft Medium Support Anti Bacterial, Bed Hotel Pillows for Back, Stomach and Side Sleepers, White
review: Fantastic supportive pillows which I use for sitting up in bed. Perfect for side sleepers.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 28 December 2023

name: Silentnight Anti-Allergy Pillows 2 Pack – Soft Medium Support Anti Bacterial, Bed Hotel Pillows for Back, Stomach and Side Sleepers, White
review: It’s been nearly a month since purchasing and both pillows are still keeping their shape which is a good sign. Bought these as found out I was allergic to feathers, so far so good, I can actually breathe through my nose in bed now. Very good quality.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 December 2023

name: Silentnight Anti-Allergy Pillows 2 Pack – Soft Medium Support Anti Bacterial, Bed Hotel Pillows for Back, Stomach and Side Sleepers, White
review: Good for kids as comfortable yet not too expensive that you don’t mind replacing them often. The pillows don’t stay fluffy for long, go flat quite quickly.
